entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is casting spells and trying to survive in the chaos.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist who is also present in the scene and seems to be trying to take control.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A character who is on a motorbike and tries to save Harry from the Death Eaters.

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort are enemies, as indicated by their actions in the scene.
Hagrid is fighting against a Death Eater on a broomstick.
Voldemort is also an enemy of Harry, as he tries to take control and screams 'Mine!!'.
Hagrid is fighting against a Death Eater on a broomstick.
